titleStmt.title: A Seasonable advice to all true Protestants in England, in this present posture of affairs discovering the present designs of the papists : with other remarkable things, tending to the peace of the church, and the security of the Protestant relion [sic] / by a sincere lover of his King and countrey.
titleStmt.author: M. D.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to M.D. cf. NUC pre-1956.
